citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Section 2.126(b) - Access and inspection of records and property: A responsible adult shall be made available to
accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:30 am and
4:00 pm on 06/11/2015. Inspector knocked and rang doorbell several times. Attempted to make contact with
licensee by cell phone multiple times and left messages. Inspector departed the facility in the morning at 9:55 am
and the afternoon at 4:15 pm. A business card was left on the front door.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
Section 2.126(b) - Access and inspection of records and property: A responsible adult shall be made available to
accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:30 am and
4:00 pm on 06/11/2015.  Inspector knocked and rang doorbell several times.  Attempted to make contact with
licensee by cell phone multiple times and left messages.  Inspector departed the facility in the morning at 9:55 am
and the afternoon at 4:15 pm.  A business card was left on the front door.
